description:
In 7 simple steps, learn how to make $20,000+ a month from home with your own Amazon FBA home business. There's no Inventory, no customers, and no shipping. Don't waste any more time not having a successful home business, Enroll Now! Course Creation - March 9, 2016

Over 1,000 students enrolled!

Develop a Successful $20,000 a Month Home Business with Amazon FBA. Let Amazon Do All the Work!

  • Learn what type of products sell best on Amazon
  • Learn the most effective methods to price your product
  • Learn how to find a supplier
  • Learn the how to optimize your product for maximum exposure


Content and Overview

Did you know that over 40% of all products sold on Amazon are not part of the Amazon inventory. These products are sold by small, one person businesses separate from Amazon. These are individuals working from home, making a killing!

The amazing thing about selling products online through Amazon FBA, is that Amazon, literally, does all the work! Amazon takes care of customer service, inventory storage, and shipping. You don't have to worry about any of this.

In this crash course, you'll learn 7 Simple Steps to make $20,000+ a month selling online with Amazon FBA! First, you'll be taught what types of products work best with Amazon FBA. Not every product out there is ideal for selling on Amazon FBA. There are certain characteristics that will render a product "sellable" with Amazon FBA.

Next, you'll learn the best practices in pricing you product for maximum profits and sales. From there, we'll discuss the many different approaches to finding a good, reliable supplier. Then, we'll discuss product optimization, and so on. You'll be on your way to having your very own (and very profitable) home business with Amazon FBA!

By the End of the Course You Will Be Able To:

  • Make $20,000 a month with your own home business
  • Find ideal products to sell with Amazon FBA
  • Price your product effectively
  • Locate reliable suppliers
  • Optimize your product completely
title: Amazon FBA Home Business: Build an Amazon FBA Home Business
